title: Konjščina
text: Konjščina () is a <a href="village">village</a> and <a href="municipality">municipality</a> in <a href="Krapina-Zagorje%20County">Krapina-Zagorje County</a> in <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>. According to the 2011 census, there are 3,790 inhabitants in the area, absolute majority which are <a href="Croats">Croats</a>. It is connected by the <a href="D24%20%28Croatia%29">D24 highway</a> and <a href="R201%20railway%20%28Croatia%29">R201 railway</a>.
